verbs.description: Michael Cohen , President Donald Trump ’s longtime personal attorney and fixer , [V: is] parting ways with his legal team as federal prosecutors in New York pursue a criminal investigation of him , according to a person familiar with the case .

[ARG0: Michael Cohen , President Donald Trump ’s longtime personal attorney and fixer ,] is [V: parting] [ARG1: ways] [ARG2: with his legal team] [ARGM-TMP: as federal prosecutors in New York pursue a criminal investigation of him] , [ARGM-ADV: according to a person familiar with the case] .

Michael Cohen , President Donald Trump ’s longtime personal attorney and fixer , is parting ways with his legal team as federal prosecutors in New York pursue a criminal investigation of him , [V: according] to a person familiar with the case .
